Posts.Content: You didn't do this to yourself- no one can bear that. When I was diagnosed with malignant melanoma, one of my brothers told me that this was the opportunity I needed to start being a better person- in context it sounded like I got cancer because I was a bad person. We can all improve, but we are all human all the time. I get to decide why I got cancer, no one else. So do you. Make it worthwhile.
Posts.Title: What Did i Do, to Get Cancer
